messages.title: This Election Isn't About The Next 5 Years - It's About The Next 50 Years
messages.content: The Green Party is offering real opposition to this Government’s extreme Brexit. We have the vision to deliver an alternative future for our country – and our place in the world. The Green Party offers a different kind of politics.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: an economy that works for all

mentions.tacticalSituation: At the last election, we were the only local party that fought austerity, opposed fracking and stood against the renewal of Trident. We are also the only opposition party with a seat on Bournemouth Council, following the election of our councillor, Simon Bull in Winton East.

issues.brexitEurope: It is also vital that we fight the ‘Brexit at any cost’ approach of the government and make sure our environment, human rights and workers’ rights are protected.
issues.defence: opposed fracking and stood against the renewal of Trident
issues.economy: Fair Economy: an economy that works for all
issues.education: Free Education: quality education, no tuition fees
issues.environment: Safe Climate: fossil free, affordable energy
issues.government: to put power back in your hands through a citizen’s democracy
issues.health: Public NHS: taking back our health service
issues.labourEmployment: It is vital that we take a stand to defend the NHS against profiteering and privatisation.
issues.transport: Better Transport: making public transport public

community.content: To build affordable homes and provide properly funded public services.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have lived in Bournemouth East for more than 20 years, since moving here to study for my degree in 1993. I now live in Charminster with my wife and two daughters.

examples: I have lived in Bournemouth East for more than 20 years, since moving here to study for my degree in 1993.
At the last election, we were the only local party that fought austerity, opposed fracking and stood against the renewal of Trident.
The Green Party is offering real opposition to this Government’s extreme Brexit.
The Green Party offers a different kind of politics.
We stand up for what matters.
Following the election of our councillor, Simon Bull in Winton East.
It is also vital that we fight the ‘Brexit at any cost’ approach of the government and make sure our environment, human rights and workers’ rights are protected.
It is vital that we take a stand to defend the NHS against profiteering and privatisation.

examples: It is also vital that we fight the ‘Brexit at any cost’ approach of the government and make sure our environment, human rights and workers’ rights are protected.
